browsers.name: Google Chrome
browsers.description: Google Chrome is a fast, secure, and easy-to-use web browser. It has a clean and simple interface and is known for its speed and reliability.

browsers.name: Mozilla Firefox
browsers.description: Mozilla Firefox is a free and open-source web browser. It is known for its customizability and privacy features, as well as its support for web standards.

browsers.name: Microsoft Edge
browsers.description: Microsoft Edge is a fast and secure web browser. It is designed to work seamlessly with Windows 10 and has a built-in set of tools for browsing the web, reading e-books, and more.
